Articles.Content:
Hi everyone! I want to present you my new plugin in progress : Challenge Them All!

'You know you are the best at piloting a spacecraft ! but do you ever wondered to proove that to everyone else ?? Then challenge them all is the perfect plugin for you! It add a full online competitive mission system!

one player create the mission of they dream and challenge every other player ! the winner will get a shiny medal !'

powered by a master server, this plugin will add a fully fonctionnal community system where some player can create mission , and other apply and try to finish the mission the fastest way possible! while speaking with the other challenger and under the cover of the mission creator!

everyone will be able to speak with everyone , that will gonna make you feel less alone in the deepspace!

How it works :

You just need to create simple account directly from the game, then connect with it, you will be then able to create or join mission in progress and try finish it the fastest way!

the winner of a mission is the one that will end the mission in the less universe relative time , so if you take 1 hour in real life and 3 day in KSP and another will take 2 hour but only 2 day, he gonna win!

the top 3 winner will be rewarded with a gold ,silver or bronze medal! (of course , they are not real !!)

the only data that transit from the client and the server is our plugin data, there will be some .craft file transfert for the need of mission that you create!

The code is still in progress, but we gonna release a beta version very soon!

This isn't Kmp, your ship will cannot interact with other player, you will still be alone in your universe.

Info tech :

Plugin writted in C# , using tcp socket network.

Server writted in java and hosted on a dedicated server.

Database powered by mysql.
